verses.verse: And David<WH1732> said,<WH559> Is there yet<WH5750> any that is left<WH3498> of the house<WH1004> of Saul,<WH7586> that I may show<WH6213> him kindness<WH2617> for Jonathan's<WH3129> sake?<WH5668>

And there was of the house<WH1004> of Saul<WH7586> a servant<WH5650> whose name<WH8034> was Ziba.<WH6717> And when they had called<WH7121> him to David,<WH1732> the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to him, Are you Ziba?<WH6717> And he said,<WH559> Your servant<WH5650> is he.

And the king<WH4428> said,<WH559> Is there not yet<WH5750> any<WH376> of the house<WH1004> of Saul,<WH7586> that I may show<WH6213> the kindness<WH2617> of God<WH430> to him? And Ziba<WH6717> said<WH559> to the king,<WH4428> Jonathan<WH3083> has yet<WH5750> a son,<WH1121> which is lame<WH5223> on his feet.<WH7272>

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to him, Where<WH375> is he? And Ziba<WH6717> said<WH559> to the king,<WH4428> Behold,<WH2009> he is in the house<WH1004> of Machir,<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Ammiel,<WH5988> in Lodebar.<WH3810>
Then king<WH4428> David<WH1732> sent,<WH7971> and fetched<WH3947> him out of the house<WH1004> of Machir,<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Ammiel,<WH5988> from Lodebar.<WH3810>

Now when Mephibosheth,<WH4648> the son<WH1121> of Jonathan,<WH3083> the son<WH1121> of Saul,<WH7586> was come<WH935> to David,<WH1732> he fell<WH5307> on<WH5921> his face,<WH6440> and did reverence.<WH7812> And David<WH1732> said,<WH559> Mephibosheth.<WH4648> And he answered,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> your servant!<WH5650>

And David<WH1732> said<WH559> to him, Fear<WH3372> not: for I will surely<WH3588> show<WH6213> you kindness<WH2617> for Jonathan<WH3083> your father's<WH1> sake,<WH5668> and will restore<WH7725> you all<WH3605> the land<WH7704> of Saul<WH7586> your father;<WH1> and you shall eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> at<WH5921> my table<WH7979> continually.<WH8548>
And he bowed<WH7812> himself, and said,<WH559> What<WH4100> is your servant,<WH5650> that you should look<WH6437> on such a dead<WH4191> dog<WH3611> as I am?

Then the king<WH4428> called<WH7121> to Ziba,<WH6717> Saul's<WH7586> servant,<WH5288> and said<WH559> to him, I have given<WH5414> to your master's<WH113> son<WH1121> all<WH3605> that pertained<WH1961> to Saul<WH7586> and to all<WH3605> his house.<WH1004>

You therefore, and your sons,<WH1121> and your servants,<WH5650> shall till<WH5647> the land<WH127> for him, and you shall bring<WH935> in the fruits, that your master's<WH113> son<WH1121> may have<WH1961> food<WH3899> to eat:<WH398> but Mephibosheth<WH4648> your master's<WH113> son<WH1121> shall eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> always<WH8548> at<WH5921> my table.<WH7979> Now Ziba<WH6717> had fifteen<WH2568> <WH6240> sons<WH1121> and twenty<WH6242> servants.<WH5650>

Then said<WH559> Ziba<WH6717> to the king,<WH4428> According to all<WH3605> that my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> has commanded<WH6680> his servant,<WH5650> so<WH3651> shall your servant<WH5650> do.<WH6213> As for Mephibosheth,<WH4648> said the king,<WH4428> he shall eat<WH398> at<WH5921> my table,<WH7979> as one<WH259> of the king's<WH4428> sons.<WH1121>

And Mephibosheth<WH4648> had a young<WH6996> son,<WH1121> whose name<WH8034> was Micha.<WH4316> And all<WH3605> that dwelled<WH4186> in the house<WH1004> of Ziba<WH6717> were servants<WH5650> to Mephibosheth.<WH4648>

So Mephibosheth<WH4648> dwelled<WH3427> in Jerusalem:<WH3389> for he did eat<WH398> continually<WH8548> at<WH5921> the king's<WH4428> table;<WH7979> and was lame<WH6455> on both<WH8147> his feet.<WH7272>
